•	ChannelPositionPlots.py
Create plots of cell locations within samples on different channels.

•	combineSets.py
Used to combine LAM-created data sets from split datasets.

•	ManualVectorPlots.py
Create plots of sample vectors with one datachannel on background, e.g. DAPI + vector

•	rotator.py
Rotate coordinates of dataset around origin to properly orientate samples for LAM vector creation.

•	split_dataset.py
Split all data and vectors in a dataset based on defined cut points.

•	SubsetDataChannel.py
Filter a datachannel for all samples found in LAM's Samples-folder to create a new datachannel.
